name: Anti
description:
Welcome to Anti a game about manipulating gravity in order to walk on the roof and walls of the world. It is a 2D platformer with hints of puzzels.  The game will have a story in the full version but as of now there will not be any story. I will keep on posting new devlogs about the game as the development of anti progresses, but for now enjoy alpha version of anti. You can check out the latest dev log about anti v2.1 here.

Controlls:
A and D for movement. Space to jump.
W on purple, yellow and orange pads to rotate.
R to restart the level
N to jump to the next level
